metadata.Description: Systems and infrastructure for transporting energy from generation sources to end users.

level 1.Description: Energy transport systems address the challenge of providing energy access to remote areas by enabling the efficient distribution of energy resources.
Energy transport systems employ smart grid technology to optimize the transmission and distribution of energy.
Energy transport systems collaborate with renewable energy developers to ensure the seamless integration of renewable energy into the grid.
Energy transport systems support the implementation of energy storage solutions to enhance grid stability and reliability.
Energy transport systems administer energy market regulations to ensure fair and efficient energy trading and distribution.
Energy transport systems measure energy losses during transmission and distribution to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
Energy transport systems align with the goal of climate change mitigation by enabling the efficient and sustainable distribution of renewable energy.
Energy transport systems are an instance of infrastructure development, specifically focused on the transmission and distribution of energy.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets employ renewable energy technologies to diversify the energy mix and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

level 2.Subject: smart metering technologies
level 2.Description: Smart metering technologies implement the Energy Efficiency Policy by providing real-time data on energy consumption.

level 2.Subject: smart metering technologies
level 2.Description: Smart metering technologies are an integral part of the smart grid infrastructure for efficient energy management.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage employs battery technologies to store and release energy efficiently, enabling the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: climate change scenario analysis
level 3.Description: Climate change scenario analysis implements sustainable energy projects to mitigate the impacts of climate change.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.
